message: ASP.NET MVC, Core 1, brought a number of changes. Some were additions, but others were removals.The structure is similar and will be mostly familiar to anyone who has worked with ASP.NET MVC, but a few stuff is very different. simple comparison, in a lightweight way.
story: Mohamed Rashed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Moving to ASP.NET MVC Core 1
caption: weblogs.asp.net
